mapper.select:
select a.art_seq as artSeq, a.thm_seq as thmSeq, a.userid as userid , a.book_seq as bookSeq, to_char(a.posting_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as postingDate, a.read_cnt as readCnt, a.title as title, a.content as content, m.name as name from Article a join Member m on a.userid = m.userid and a.userid = #{searchVal}
where art_seq = #{theme}

select t2.* from (select rownum as seq,t.* from ( select a.art_seq as artSeq, a.thm_seq as thmSeq, a.userid as userid , a.book_seq as bookSeq, to_char(a.posting_date,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') as postingDate, a.read_cnt as readCnt, a.title as title, a.content as content, m.name as name from Article a join Member m on a.userid = m.userid
and a.thm_seq = #{theme} order by postingDate desc ) t)t2 where t2.seq between #{start} and #{end} order by t2.seq asc
